code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'../styles/Magasin.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Shop(){const[date,setDate]=useState(new Date());useEffect(()=>{const timer=setInterval(()=>{setDate(new Date());},1000);return()=>clearInterval(timer);},[]);const hour=date.getHours();const minute=date.getMinutes().toString().padStart(2,'0');const second=date.getSeconds().toString().padStart(2,'0');const isOpen=hour>=9&&hour<18;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shop-infos",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome to our Shop!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"clock",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Current hour: ",hour,"h",minute,":",second]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:isOpen?"We are open!":"Sorry, we are closed."})]});}export default Shop;
